name: Logic Maze Lite
description:
Logic Maze is a challenging, beautifully hand drawn puzzle game for everyone. Your task is to bring the ball to the hole. See if you're smart enough to beat the game!

* Fully hand drawn!
* Retina support
* Easy starting levels to get the feel of the game
* Advanced hint system for each level
* Swipe or Tilt control
* Gets really challenging in later stages
publishers: SWIFT APPS SP Z O O
